Sentencas: BaCeO3-based perovskites are well-known proton and oxygen ion conductors.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: For practical applications as electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells, these compounds must be robust towards reduction of cerium ion.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: In this work, we explore the effect of reducing atmosphere on the physical properties of undoped and Nb-doped BaCeO3.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: The BaCeO3 perovskite structure is thermodynamically stable at least up to 1450 degrees C upon annealing in H2-containing atmosphere.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: Annealing at 1550 degrees C causes a decomposition of the BaCeO3.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: The higher annealing temperature leads to higher concentration of Ce3+ ions and a higher electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: With increasing the annealing temperature from 1300 to 1450 degrees C, the activation energy of conductivity decreases from Ea = 0.31-0.263 eV.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: We attribute the electrical conductivity in reduced BaCeO3 to the activation of the small polaron hopping in agreement with the recent first-principles calculations.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3

Sentencas: However, in contrast to the theoretical predictions, we find no evidence of the Ce3+-Ce3+ spin-singlet small bipolarons.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity, magnetism, and optical properties of reduced BaCeO3
